sentence: State Sen. Doug Mastriano took part in the Jan. 6, 2021, "Stop the Steal" rally and went to the U.S. Capitol afterward, and his ideology can be summed up as Christian nationalism -- so it's not surprising that he has spoken at events hosted by the apocalyptic "Rod of Iron Ministries" founded by the Rev.
author: Travis Gettys
title: Gun-worshiping MAGA 'cult' moves closer into GOP mainstream with Pennsylvania primary win: historian
